Invoke public method Raycast on MonoBehaviour id 963194229 configured with m_Script (fileID: 11500000, guid: eb5dd43baba2d4dc1bab789615567e3d, type: 3), which corresponds to GvrPointerPhysicsRaycaster attached to GameObject 'Main Camera' (fileID: 963194225). Scene config shows raycasterEventMask bits=0xFFFFFFFF and maxRaycastHits=96. To exercise code paths, an EventSystem with GvrPointerInputModule must provide a non-null Pointer; pointer.raycastMode and CurrentPointerRadius determine whether GvrBasePointerRaycaster.Raycast calls RaycastDefault/Hybrid and whether PerformRaycast uses Physics.RaycastNonAlloc (radius==0) or Physics.SphereCastNonAlloc (radius>0). Ensure at least one Collider is in the Main Camera forward direction and within the event mask.

Trigger public methods on GvrReticlePointer MonoBehaviour (id: 723926960) instantiated from prefab instance (fileID: 1783449437) attached under 'Main Camera'. Scene meta shows MonoBehaviour.m_Script {fileID:11500000,guid:e7dcc90c2e60c4011896c7f21fc1f557,type:3} which corresponds to GvrReticlePointer.cs provided. This will cover reticle click events and diameter updates without relying on EventSystem. Note: Player MonoBehaviour (id: 94197002, guid:3256cf44665cfef47aebd3ad3a953393) has only Start/Update which run automatically. Main Camera MonoBehaviour (id: 963194229, guid:eb5dd43baba2d4dc1bab789615567e3d) corresponds to GvrPointerPhysicsRaycaster; its public Raycast requires PointerEventData parameters and a GvrPointerInputModule to populate Pointer; thus we avoid redundant manual trigger until EventSystem details are provided.
